jobDescription: At AppSphere, I worked closely with multiple clients to understand their requirements and deliver high-quality products. I gained extensive hands-on experience in developing and maintaining real-world web and mobile applications, ensuring robust and testable code. My contributions included creating custom libraries and reusable components, streamlining existing codebases to improve performance, and enhancing user experiences. Additionally, I focused on optimizing application features and ensuring code quality through diligent testing practices.

During my internship at 6Simplex, I gained exposure to large-scale application development and contributed to a Geo-Spatial Information System (GIS) project using JavaScript and React. My role included REST API integration and learning scalable software practices, marking my first step into professional development.
